heif.boxes

Class ItemPropertiesBox.ItemPropertyContainerBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.ItemPropertiesBox.ItemPropertyContainerBox
  • Enclosing class:
    ItemPropertiesBox

    private static final class ItemPropertiesBox.ItemPropertyContainerBox
extends Box
    Represents the ipco (ItemPropertyContainerBox), a nested container holding an implicitly indexed list of item property boxes.

    Each property describes an aspect of an image or media item, such as color information, pixel layout, or transformation metadata.

    Refer to the Specification document - ISO/IEC 23008-12:2017 on Page 28 for more information.

      • properties

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemPropertyContainerBox

        private ItemPropertyContainerBox(Box box,
                                 SequentialByteReader reader)
        Constructs an ItemPropertyContainerBox resource by reading sequential boxes from the SequentialByteReader.

        Each property box is read, added to the property list, and skipped over to handle cases where specific handlers for sub-boxes may not yet be implemented.

        Parameters:
        box - the parent Box containing size and header information
        reader - the sequential byte reader for parsing box data
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a sub-box reports a negative size (corrupted file)
